  1. WHAT WE DO
  2. STRATEGIC MEETING DESIGN & FACILITATION

Get the most out of your time with focused, energizing meetings.

Feeling drained by virtual meetings? You’re not alone. A recent large-scale study found that all these virtual meetings take an enormous psychic toll on employees, especially on women.

In a world where hybrid workplaces are becoming the norm, BOxD can help you have more energizing, focused meetings. Whether you’re planning a virtual offsite, a hybrid strategic meeting, or an in-person retreat, we can help you get the most out of your time together to generate meaningful discussions and make rapid progress on decisions that matter.

Some topics we've helped groups with:

Strategic planning and priorities
Identity and purpose
Solution and design sprints
Evolutions: business models, organization design,
operating model, etc.
Prioritization or decision making
Team resets
Conflict resolution.

Why Strategic Meetings are different with us

Engaging but never cheesy

Our methods help people stretch their thinking, contribute their ideas, and make higher-quality decisions. Absolutely zero trust falls or egg parachutes, we swear. Every single moment is designed to get you closer to your outcomes.

Stealthy team building

We design your meetings so that your team gets stronger as they actually do work together.

Learn more about how you can invest more deeply in your team.

Virtual and in-person expertise

Our team has over 250 years of combined experience successfully working in and leading distributed teams. We love creating energizing and productive exerpeices online and in person.

Ready to find out how you can make the most out of your meetings?
